attributes.action: call an immendiate general election to see if the country supports his management of the country and the economy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Taxes rise uncontrolled. We are taxed on taxes. Tax law changes to penalise people who have already purchased cars.  Retrospective Taxation is wrong.
Everyone is paying more for less.
The government wastes billions on pointless PFI and QANGOs.  
They lend BILLIONS to private companies (banks for example) with NO benefit to the working person.
MPs have few checks and balances for their own personal expenses.  They vote their own payrises through.  Isn't it time we saw whether the people who have to pay for all this are happy about the way the country is run?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
